revised_title: Further Observations on the Development of Apteryx
tldr: The author examines the development of Apteryx australis, focusing on the beak, limbs, skull, and shoulder-girdle. They provide new insights into the pre-sphenoid region, basi-cranial fontanelles, and the presence of a ligamentous pro-coracoid in A. australis. The study also highlights the avian characteristics of the brain in this species.
